Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.ext.ExtensionQuery

  • Packages that use ExtensionQuery 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.ext
    Extendable QueryParser provides a simple and flexible extension mechanism by overloading query field names.

    • Uses of ExtensionQuery in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.ext

      Methods in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.ext with parameters of type ExtensionQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Query ParserExtension.parse(ExtensionQuery query)
      Processes the given ExtensionQuery and returns a corresponding Query instance.
